author: Simon Difford
description: A classic Daiquiri with the gentle touch of melon.
name: Melon Daiquiri #1 (served 'up')
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut melon into 8 segments and deseed
Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and MUDDLE in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
